Youʼve been invited to Chris and Joʼs wedding!

Itʼs happening on Saturday 23rd of April 2022, from 10:30 in Leeds!

The adventure starts at Civic Hall in the Banqueting Suite.

After some important words, signing some documents, and maybe taking some pictures, the adventure moves to the Adelphi!

There will be a buffet at lunchtime with options for vegans, vegetarians and meat eaters.

Weʼve booked a room for the whole day, so feel free to come and go as you please.

The dreaded COVID section

We wonʼt know the rules until closer to the time, but right now wedding ceremonies are allowed to happen with no restrictions. Weʼve planned as if these rules wonʼt change and weʼll be able go ahead in April 2022.

Depending on the rules at the time, we might need to limit the number of people at the ceremony or at the pub afterwards - but if anything changes weʼll let you know.

We know this makes it hard to plan for and weʼre sorry but weʼll do our best to keep you informed.

If you cannot come due to COVID, thatʼs absolutely fine and we totally understand - weʼd rather you were safe and happy than that you came and felt uncomfortable!

Important to know

What should I wear?

Something that you like and thatʼs comfortable. Weʼll be dressed up but you donʼt have to be, if you donʼt want. There is time to change between the ceremony and pub (as long as you are staying in Leeds), so you donʼt need to wear the same thing all day.

What food will there be?

Weʼve arranged a buffet at the Adelphi and weʼll be bringing cake. We think thereʼs a good selection for all diets, but if you have any specific needs let us know.

Weʼll have put some money behind the bar for your first couple of drinks, but after that youʼll still be able to buy whatever youʼd like from the bar.

Can I bring someone?

You can totally bring someone that you like, and who is nice. Children are welcome, but there wonʼt be many other children for them to play with. The reception is in a pub and weʼll be bringing some board games, but there may not be lots for them to do.

How are we getting between the two places?

The places are about a 15 minute walk through Leeds city centre.

Should I get you a gift?

No, you absolutely donʼt need to get us anything.

If you want to get us something, feel free to chip in to our honeymoon fund, but it isnʼt expected.

You can do this using our PayPal, which will open in a new window.
